author: ajensenwaud
body:
- Add FreeBSD OS support so that the base powershell image can be downloaded
- Fix case so that it avoids bash exit with 'too many arguments' on FreeBSD 10 / bash4

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: So this is interesting, since .NET Core has no support yet for BSD, we won't be publishing explicitly built packages anytime soon. Assuming that the macOS PKG works on FreeBSD, I have no problem with this. @ajensenwaud can you verify?
